name: Discord
description: Link to the Hobbit speedrun Discord chat group.

name: Speedrun.com
description: Link to the Hobbit speedrun.com page. Features leaderboards for all categories and more.

name: HobbitInstaller
description: A custom installer to simplify the process of setting up the game for speedruns.

name: PC Speedrunning Patch
description: Removes frame timing differences causing inconsistent physics. Required for PC speedruns. Automatically included if you use HobbitInstaller.

name: HobbitSpeedrunTools
description: A custom tool offering quick and easy access to cheats and practice saves for the PC version.

name: LiveSplit
description: Handy speedrun timer, easy to use and highly customizable.

name: LiveSplit Splits
description: Contains a split for each of the levels with icons.

name: GCN Autosplitter
description: An autosplitter for the GCN version of the game. Works using image recognition. Developed by Shockster.

name: PC Autosplitter
description: An Autosplitter for livesplit. It will automatically remove load times, just make sure you're set to time with game-time and not real-time in livesplit. It only works on the 1.3 version of the game, and does not work accurately for MG runs.

name: GCN Emulator Practice Savestates
description: A collection of savestates all throughout the game to help with practice. Make sure you use the same Dolphin version as the saves.

name: DxWnd
description: Lets you run the PC version in windowed mode. Comes with a Hobbit preset.

name: DxWnd Config Files
description: Two community made Hobbit config files for DxWnd. You can use these as is or as a base to change to your liking.

name: PC Practice Saves
description: A collection of saves all throughout the game to help with practice.

name: GitHub
description: This website is open-source meaning that if you find an issue or want to add something then you can put in an issue or pull request.
